Class Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • Job

  • public class Job
extends java.lang.Object
    Our representation of a delivery job, kept as simple as possible.

    • Field Summary

      Start and end points of a job.

    • Field Detail

      • end

        private Point end
        Start and end points of a job.

      • length

        private int length
        Shortest distance between start and end of a job, i.e. its length. Since it is unaffected by the grid layout, we may calculate it once and cache the result.

      • start

        private Point start
        Start and end points of a job.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Job

        public Job(Point start,
   Point end)
        Constructs a new job between the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        start - Pick-up point of a job, i.e. where it starts.
        end - Delivery point of a job, i.e. where it ends.

    • Method Detail

      • getEnd

        public Point getEnd()
        Returns:
        End point of this job.

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Gets the shortest distance between start and end of the job.
        Returns:
        Length of the job, from start to end.

      • getStart

        public Point getStart()
        Returns:
        Start point of this job.
